trends: There have been 22 other sightings in Denton
There were no other sightings in Denton on or around March 31st 2012
Summary: a glowing orange sphere flew in a perfectly straight line at a slow speed at low altitude wth absolutly no sound, 4 witness's
divs: Sighting Detailsas my self and two others in my back yard were just hanging out before everyone left. i saw an orange glowing sphere coming over the house. i dont know how high it was but it was defenently to low for a reg aircraft. the three of us stood and watched it pass over the house for about one min. there was no sound what so ever, my girlfriends unkle tryed telling me it was a "falling star" and i instintly called him an idiot. i have been watching the stars a good portion of my life and i have never seen anything like that . we watched it head north west at around 11:30 pm as it flickered off in the distance.
